summary: A ruthless CEO holds a whistle blower captive when she tries to stop a top-secret particle acceleration experiment she fears may create a black hole on earth.
cast: Adrian Paul|Amanda Tapping|Andrew McIlroy|Kirsten Robek|Roger Cross|Michael Rivkin|French Tickner|Malcolm McDowell|Desiree Zurowski|Carlton Watson|Apollonia Vanova|Martin Budny|Ulla Friis|Frank Cipriano|Adam Murphy|Liduina Vanderspek|Trevor Roberts|Matthew Sulzle
keywords: black hole|blind woman|sucked into a black hole|antiproton|proton
director: Director: Gilbert M. Shilton (as Gilbert Shilton)
title: Experimento mortal
